welcome_message_body: Welcome to Calbayog City, known for its breathtaking waterfalls and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all the charm this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Carlos n' Carmelos

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Calbayog Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Calbayog Airport handles the transportation of goods and supplies.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
